divs: Sighting DetailsI hope i have filled in the fields required! I am doing this on behalf of the lady mentioned... I am the secondary e-mail (Heidi Niel) and i am in the UK. Hence i cannot help Nikki directly. She is terrified...this appears to be now happening to her son too...who infact witnessed or heard "them" talking to her at the time mentioned today! She has history of abductions....the details of which she will inform you. Her son too has been abducted also apparently and has scars....please please help this lovely lady as her son is talking suicide (17 years old) Kind Regards Heidi Niel UK
Summary: history of abductions Son being abducted also son witnessed current event
